alert.note: Alert for Peach; Pulaski (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 25 at 11:08AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Pulaski, southwestern Twiggs, southwestern Bleckley, southeastern Peach and Houston Counties through 1145 AM EDT... At 1108 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Perry, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Perry, Hawkinsville, Warner Robins, Hayneville, Tarversville, Meadowdale, Sand Bed, Houston Lake, Grovania, Grove Park, Magnolia, Ocmulgee Public Fishing Area, Moss Oak, Pulaski State Prison, Bonaire, Kathleen, Klondike, Clinchfield, Paulk and Porter. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
